summary: ShareServe is an instant messaging app with photo and video sharing, AI image and video generation, account creation with custom username/profile number, contacts system, dark theme UI, text effects, and visual polish. Messaging is between in-app accounts only. AI generation follows standard content policies.
architectural_notes: Messaging is in-app only; no external SMS or phone network integration
AI generation features must follow standard content policies — no unregulated generation
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- ShareServe app logo — bold neon-outlined 'S' monogram with a glowing electric violet and cyan gradient on a near-black background, modern futuristic style (shareserve-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Dark abstract background texture with faint grid lines and subtle neon glow particles for use as a full-screen app background (app-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Video facts card placeholder background — blurred cosmic/space scene with deep blues and purples (video-facts-bg.dim_800x450.png)

existing_features.title: Implement in-app messaging between registered users: users can send and receive text messages in one-on-one chat threads. Messages are stored in the backend and retrieved per conversation. Messaging only works between accounts within the app — no external SMS or phone network integration.

Implement photo sharing in chats and on a user profile feed: users can upload photos (stored as base64 or asset URL in the backend), share them in messages, and view shared photos in a gallery-style feed.
Implement video sharing in chats and on a user profile feed: users can upload short videos, share them in messages, and play them inline within the chat or feed view.

Add an AI image generation feature accessible from a dedicated 'Create' tab: users enter a text prompt and receive a generated image they can save to their profile or share in a chat. Generation follows standard content policies.

Add an AI video generation feature on the same 'Create' tab: users enter a text prompt or description and receive a generated short video clip they can save or share. Generation follows standard content policies.

Build the full frontend UI with a dark theme: deep dark backgrounds (near-black), vibrant neon accent colors (e.g., electric violet, cyan, hot pink), glowing UI elements, animated text effects (shimmer, glow, typewriter), gradient highlights, and a sleek futuristic layout. Apply the theme consistently across all screens.

Add a 'Video Facts' section or widget on the home/discovery screen: display a rotating carousel of short informational video cards covering interesting topics (space, science, history, etc.). Videos are static placeholder clips with overlay text facts.
Build a user profile screen showing: profile number, avatar, display name, username, bio, post/photo/video gallery, and a button to edit profile details.

new_feature_requests.summary: Account creation with custom username and profile number
Dark theme UI with cool visual polish and text effects
AI image generation feature (standard content policies)
AI video generation feature (standard content policies)
Contacts system for managing user connections
Video facts and informational content display

Implement backend user account system: users can register with a unique username, auto-generated profile number (e.g., #00123), display name, avatar URL, and bio. Store profiles in stable backend state. Support login via Internet Identity.
Implement a contacts system: users can search for other users by username or profile number, send contact requests, accept or decline requests, and view their contacts list.
